data.title: Other Royal and Noble Weddings

data.text:
Wedding of Olga Castell-Rüdenhausen and Dominik de Löwenstein-Wertheim-Rosenberg

VIP.pt:. Galeria : Príncipe alemão casa em Portugal

The civil wedding was in Germany in September but the religious ceremony was in Portugal on 6th of October.

Both bride and groom have somehow links to Portugal: the bride is a great-grandaughter of the Marchioness Olga Cadaval. the groom is son of prince Aloys-konstantin de Löwenstein-wertheim-rosenberg and princess Anastasia of Prussia and a nephew of archiduchess Maria of Habsburg who lives in Estoril, Portugal for decades.

The bride was born in 1987, has a bachelor in Marketing and Comunication and Masters in Corporate Social Responsability. The groom has 29 years old and works for a firm devoted to agriculture and energetic sources. After the weddding they will live in Hanburg

Wedding of Olga Castell-Rüdenhausen and Dominik de Löwenstein-Wertheim-Rosenberg

VIP.pt:. Galeria : Príncipe alemão casa em Portugal

The civil wedding was in Germany in September but the religious ceremony was in Portugal on 6th of October.

Both bride and groom have somehow links to Portugal: the bride is a great-grandaughter of the Marchioness Olga Cadaval. the groom is son of prince Aloys-konstantin de Löwenstein-wertheim-rosenberg and princess Anastasia of Prussia and a nephew of archiduchess Maria of Habsburg who lives in Estoril, Portugal for decades.

The bride was born in 1987, has a bachelor in Marketing and Comunication and Masters in Corporate Social Responsability. The groom has 29 years old and works for a firm devoted to agriculture and energetic sources. After the weddding they will live in Hanburg

The latest Issue of the Casteller Nachrichten has some pictures of the religious Wedding

http://www.castell-bank.de/uploads/media/Casteller_Nachrichten_42_2012.pdf

The latest Issue of the Casteller Nachrichten has some pictures of the religious Wedding

http://www.castell-bank.de/uploads/media/Casteller_Nachrichten_42_2012.pdf

Nice to see more pics of the wedding, but it's a pity that the pictures have a very low resolution. Is the bride wearing a small, spikey tiara? I was quite disappointed that she didn't wear the beautiful floral tiara of her mother-in-law.

Nice to see more pics of the wedding, but it's a pity that the pictures have a very low resolution. Is the bride wearing a small, spikey tiara? I was quite disappointed that she didn't wear the beautiful floral tiara of her mother-in-law.

Probably a Castell-Rüdenhausen tiara. As they have their own tiara's i didn't expect her to wear a tiara of her husband's Family.

Christoph-Joseph Barelli married to Countess Marie-Eleonor von Kuefstein in a religious ceremony at Röhrenbach on 13 July 2013.

The bride, 23, is the third daughter of Count Andreas von Kuefstein and of his wife, née Princess Elisabeth of Bavaria (a daughter of the late Prince Rasso of Bavaria and of his wife Princess Theresa).

Here is a gallery of pictures of the marriage:

Hochzeit im Hause Kuefstein - Horn - meinbezirk.at

Prince Hadrien de Croÿ-Roeulx married to Jacqueline-Ariadne Desmarais on 7 September 2013 at the Cathedral Marie-Reine-du-Monde in Montréal, Canada.

The groom, 30, is the son of Prince and Princess Olivier de Croÿ-Roeulx.

The bride, 23, is the daughter of André Desmarais (himself the son of Paul Desmarais, a Canadian financier and billionair) and of his wife, née France Chrétien (daughter of former Canadian Prime Minister Jean Chrétien).

Mariage princier à Montréal | Faits divers et judiciaire | Actualité | Le Journal de Montréal

Beaucoup de personnalités présentes · Mariage d'une petite-fille de Desmarais et Chrétien| Galeries d'images | Actualités | Canoe.ca

Hello to all forum members!

I would like to give notice to you of an important social event in the nobility and Portuguese society in Gavião, Alto-Alentejo.

Dom Antonio Maria Infante da Câmara Mascarenhas, current 14th Count of Conculim and future representative of Casas de Fronteira, Alorna and Távora, future successor of his father Dom José Maria Pinto Basto Mascarenhas, 14º Conde da Torre, de juro e herdade, 13º Marquês de Fronteira, 15º Conde de Assumar, 11º Marquês de Alorna, genealogical representative recognized by charter of the Council of Nobility on November 19, 2014 of the titles of Marquês de Távora, Conde de São João da Pesqueira e Conde de Alvor, Portuguese representation of the title Conde de Oeynhausen-Gravenburg in Austria. Will succed his father in the administration of Fundação das Casas de Fronteira e Alorna e the renowned national monument Palácio Fronteira.

The bride is Miss Maria Helena Lino Neto da Motta Guedes, originating from the maternal side from Gavião so the marriage will be celebrated this coming day July 23, 2016 in the Church Matriz de Gavião, Alto Alentejo, at 16h00 followed by a reception of the guests in the House of bride's parents in the village center.

I thought it would be in your interest to this forum so I will post some pictures I took with my phone.

Attachments

eeeeee.jpg

IMG_2388.jpg

IMG_2432.jpg

IMG_2434.jpg

IMG_2435.jpg

The bride was the eldest daughter of the 6th Marquess and Marchioness of Bath.

The groom was the son of Mr. and Mrs. Henry Somerset; his father was a grandson of Lord Henry Somerset, second son of the 8th Duke of Beaufort. David himself succeeded in 1984 as the 11th Duke of Beaufort, at the death of his relative Henry Somerset, 10th Duke of Beaufort (whose wife was Lady Mary Cambridge, née Princess Mary of Teck, a niece of Queen Mary of the UK).

Diana Countess Bernadotte and Stefan Dedek have married

Diana Countess Bernadotte, born on 18 April 1982, is the youngest daughter of Lennart Count Bernadotte (1909-2004) and Sonja Countess Bernadotte (1944-2008). Lennart grew up at the court in Stockholm, but he left the throne for his first marriage with a bourgeois woman in 1932 and received the family-owned island of Mainau for cultivation. He built it as a flower parade and a tourist destination, where Diana Countess Bernadotte also has her studio as a Hat designer. In 2003, she married the chimney sweeper Bernd Grawe, in 2007 the couple announced the separation. She has been married to Stefan Dedek since August in her second marriage

Konstanz: Unkonventionelles Ja-Wort auf der Mainau: Diana Gräfin Bernadotte und Stefan Dedek haben sich getraut | SÜDKURIER Online
